title: Thumbnail / Graphic Designer
job_overview:
Job Title: YouTube Thumbnail / Graphic Designer

Location: Remote (8:00 AM to 4:00 PM Philippine Time Zone)

We are seeking a highly creative and skilled Thumbnail Artist to join our team. As a Thumbnail Artist, you will play a crucial role in capturing the attention of the viewers through captivating thumbnails.

Responsibilities:

    Design visually appealing thumbnails for different social media videos, ensuring they are eye-catching and informative,.
    Collaborate with the creative team to conceptualize and develop thumbnail ideas that resonate with our target audience.
    Utilize Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator to create high-quality, optimized thumbnails for various platforms.

Requirements:

    Proven experience and proficiency in Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator.
    Exceptional creative and artistic abilities with a keen eye for design, composition, and color.
    Strong understanding of digital marketing principles and the ability to tailor thumbnails to optimize click-through rates.
    Excellent communication and collaboration skills, as you'll be working closely with our creative team in a remote environment.
    Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
    Self-motivated and able to work independently while adhering to the given guidelines and requirements.

Working Hours:

This is a remote position with working hours from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM M-F Philippine Time Zone.

Rates:

The rates are $4.30 per hour, 8 hrs a day, 40 days a week. Payments are made bi-weekly. 

If you're passionate about creating visually captivating thumbnails and enhancing digital content engagement, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity and be a key contributor to our creative team.

To apply, please send your resume, portfolio showcasing your thumbnail design work, and a brief cover letter explaining why you would be an excellent fit for this role. Please include the word SOFA in your message title otherwise you application won't be considered.
